Cyberpunk 2077

Quick Facts

  • Release Date: December 10, 2020
  • Developer: CD PROJEKT RED
  • Publisher: CD PROJEKT RED
  • Platforms: PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S
  • Genre: Action RPG
  • Price: £49.99

Game Description

Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world action RPG set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour, and body modification. Play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.

Key Features

  • Immersive first-person perspective
  • Deep character customization
  • Branching storylines and multiple endings
  • Advanced cybernetic modifications
  • Dynamic combat system
  • Vast open world to explore

Game Systems

Character Building

Customize your character's skills, attributes, and cyberware.

Combat

Mix gunplay, melee, and hacking in dynamic combat scenarios.

Story Choices

Your decisions shape the story and Night City's future.
